game.name: Five Nights at Freddy's 3
game.shortDescription: Thirty years after Freddy Fazbear's Pizza closed it's doors, the events that took place there have become nothing more than a rumor and a childhood memory, but the owners of "Fazbear's Fright: The Horror Attraction" are determined to revive the legend and make the experience as authentic as possible
game.shortDescriptionEn: Thirty years after Freddy Fazbear's Pizza closed it's doors, the events that took place there have become nothing more than a rumor and a childhood memory, but the owners of "Fazbear's Fright: The Horror Attraction" are determined to revive the legend and make the experience as authentic as possible

reviewHighlights.text: audio devices error camera system error ventilation error error error error error error error error error error error error error error error error er...
5일차는 시1발 이게 사람이 클리어 하라고 만든거냐 시발련아 ㅋㅋㅋ 옛날 추억에 잠시 잠겨서 야무지게 할려고 했는데 시발 이게 머꼬 ㅋㅋ 침..... 4일차 논스톱으로 1트에 갰는데 5일차는 스프링 트랩 쥐ㅈ민이가 어디선가 자꾸 오는데 안 보여요 시발 ㅠㅠㅠㅠㅠㅠㅠㅠ
